name: ly2314
body:
### Projects by ly2314
+ [ly2314/S3Drop](https://github.com/ly2314/S3Drop): A Dropbox-like storage API. Storage provided by Amazon Web Service.
+ [ly2314/S3Drop-FrontEnd](https://github.com/ly2314/S3Drop-FrontEnd): A simple front end of S3Drop.
+ [ly2314/QtPainter_Qt5](https://github.com/ly2314/QtPainter_Qt5): A painting application written by C++ and Qt5.
+ [ly2314/Laravel-OAuth2](https://github.com/ly2314/Laravel-OAuth2): A OAuth2 server, using Laravel framework.
+ [ly2314/Django-OAuth](https://github.com/ly2314/Django-OAuth): A OAuth2 server, using Django framework.
+ [ly2314/PlurkBot-TaipeiWeather](https://github.com/ly2314/PlurkBot-TaipeiWeather): A plurk bot which posts weather forecast.
+ [ly2314/KanColleViewer-ReleaseBuild](https://github.com/ly2314/KanColleViewer-ReleaseBuild): A auto build of KanColleViewer.
+ [ly2314/NMLab_Painter](https://github.com/ly2314/NMLab_Painter): Qt4 version painting application.
+ [ly2314/AWS-Console](https://github.com/ly2314/AWS-Console): A simple console that shows your Amazon Web Service(AWS) account status.
+ [ly2314/PowerPointFacebookAPI](https://github.com/ly2314/PowerPointFacebookAPI): A basic VSTO application that lets you share slides on Facebook.
### Windows Phone Apps by ly2314
+ [PLURKLY!](http://www.windowsphone.com/s?appid=35f617a9-5417-4e04-8dbf-7404162050d2): A Windows Phone Plurk Client application.
+ [FileBox](http://www.windowsphone.com/s?appid=90b6f266-c0e1-4c40-83cd-45f1ae22967a): A Windows Phone Dropbox Client application.
+ [Daily Pixiv](http://www.windowsphone.com/s?appid=95524a77-ea40-4787-9c09-1fcb0874fee1): Shows daily illustration rankings of Pixiv, Tinami and NICONICO Seiga.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
